message: I'm excited to offer you this great product for a special price. I think you'll really love it!
I appreciate the offer, but $110 is a bit higher than I'm looking to spend right now. How about $105?
I understand you're looking to save some money, but I have to make sure I get a good deal too. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $112.50
I'm still hoping to get a better price. Let's go with $110 - that's a good compromise for both of us.
I'm not willing to go any lower than $112.50, but I'm willing to meet you halfway on the price. How about $113?
